::: {#hero-heading}
Kaan Sevim is an Assistant Professor of **Social Work** at Istanbul Sabahattin Zaim University. My competency areas include social work, migration, aging studies, and discrimination research, with a focus on the stigmatization and exclusion of migrants and older adults. I also serves as the Editor-in-Chief of the Turkish Journal of Social Work.
[Learn more about me →](/about){.about-links .subtitle}
:::
